FuncDef:
The dhcpv6 enable command enables DHCPv6.
The dhcpv6 disable command disables DHCPv6.
The undo dhcpv6 disable command enables DHCPv6.
By default, DHCPv6 is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before configuring a device as a DHCPv6 client, relay agent, or server, run the dhcpv6 enable or undo dhcpv6 disable command to enable DHCPv6.
After the dhcpv6 disable command is run, DHCPv6 is disabled, but other DHCPv6 configurations still exist.
